attributes.action: Stop North Lincolnshire Council from introducing parking charges and damaging the economy of Brigg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since free parking for the first two hours was introduced in the car parks of Brigg in North Lincolnshire the town has seen a revival. If parking charges are re-introduced shoppers will be driven from this small market town into the large out of town shopping centres a couple of miles away. Help us protect the vibrant local economy of this small town from the damage it suffered when these charges were last imposed.
